
                            
                            <p>1.翼支付APP-底部【权益】-权益商城-悦享会员0元开 <br> 2.开通后顶部权益【翼支付甄选】点进去领5-5券，下拉有5元的实物 点击购买显示支付5元-然后选择翼支付支付 输入密码前会显示抵扣5元，支付0元<img referrerpolicy=" " src="https://image.baidu.com/search/down?url=http://img.zuanke8.cn/forum/202505/04/142304lec4cwrrpg84e824.jpg" data-fancybox="article-img" data-src="https://image.baidu.com/search/down?url=http://img.zuanke8.cn/forum/202505/04/142304lec4cwrrpg84e824.jpg"> <br> </p>
